content: HLC-AC Sleeve anchor Economical sleeve anchor (acorn nut) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Stud-type anchor design allows easy through-type fastenings and can be set in bottomless hole Acorn head ideal for special applications Pre-assembled anchor for easy and fast installation Anchor size is same as drill bit size for easy installation Comprehensive testing in block, masonry and concrete base materials Applications Fastening in solid concrete and masonry base materials ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Externally threaded w/acorn nut Environmental conditions: Indoor, dry conditions Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Externally threaded w/acorn nut | Environmental conditions | Indoor, dry conditions | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 336232 - Sleeve anchor HLC-AC 1/4 x 1-3/8 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HLC-AC 1/4X1 3/8 Sleeve anchor assy - 338078 - Sleeve anchor HLC-AC 1/4 x 1-3/8 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1800x HLC-AC 1/4X1 3/8 Sleeve anchor assy - 336233 - Sleeve anchor HLC-AC 1/4 x 2-1/4 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HLC-AC 1/4X2 1/4 Sleeve anchor assy - 338079 - Sleeve anchor HLC-AC 1/4 x 2-1/4 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1200x HLC-AC 1/4X2 1/4 Sleeve anchor assy
